document.full_text: three suicide bombers killed 20 people in an attack on a construction firm in a restive province in southeastern afghanistan, government officials said on monday, with the taliban claiming responsibility for the assault.
document.title: suicide bombers kill 20 in afghanistan's southeast
lines_and_colors: three suicide bombers killed 20 people in an attack on a construction firm in a restive province in southeastern afghanistan, government officials said on monday, with the taliban claiming responsibility for the assault.
